channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Multicultural New Orleans awaits arrival of 'Swamp Sweep' immigration crackdown
item.description: New Orleans is warily awaiting a monthslong federal crackdown to arrest thousands of immigrants

item.title: Descendants obtain works of enslaved potter in landmark restitution deal
item.description: The family of enslaved potter David Drake — known as “Dave the Potter” — has reclaimed two rare stoneware jars he created in South Carolina before the...

item.title: The Ten Commandments are up in Texas schools. They're also being taken down
item.description: A new Texas law says every public school classroom must display a poster listing the Ten Commandments

item.title: Advocacy groups urge parents to avoid AI toys this holiday season
item.description: Children’s and consumer advocacy groups are urging parents not to buy AI-powered toys during the holiday season

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Wednesday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Wednesday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 10-31-49-51-68, Powerball: 19
